row.process: :set &uc_register_ofile = sys_last_registered_ofile :set &uc_register_ulogin = sys_last_registered_ulogin :set &uc_register_otype# = sys_act_me_type() :if &uc_register_otype# = 'JOBS' : set &uc_windows_typ = get_att(win_typ) : if &UC_WINDOWS_TYP = "BAT" : set &UC_PATH_JOBMD# = STR_SUB("&UC_JOBMD", "\", "\\") if exist "&uc_register_ofile" ( &UC_JOBMD JNR=&UC_REALNR MNR=&UC_MANDANT PNR=&UC_IP_PORT IPA=&UC_IP_ADR TYP=O ULOGIN=&uc_register_ulogin OUTFILE="&uc_register_ofile" ) : INC JOBI.RETENTION_DAYS, NOFOUND=IGNORE : endif :endif
